Chinese passenger airlines can increase number of US flights -USDOTThe U.S. Transportation Department said on Monday it has agreed to allow Chinese airlines to boost the number of weekly flights to the U.S. to 50 starting March 31, up from the current 35. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:23:32 GMT CBXJPSU5Q5ICZJFUHDDMUJYLV4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinese-passenger-airlines-can-increase-number-us-flights-usdot-2024-02-26/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Cuba's top cigar maker smokes sales record on booming high-end demandCuba's top cigar maker Habanos said on Monday its sales had soared to a record $721 million in 2023, a benchmark the company's executives attributed to booming demand for its most luxurious, high-end smokes in markets including China. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:16:20 GMT 52KWS2KNDNKLZGMXJVMCVC4VRU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cubas-top-cigar-maker-smokes-sales-record-booming-high-end-demand-2024-02-26/Dave Sherwood世界美洲
Morning Bid: Japan's first inflation undershoot in 2 years?A look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 21:46:47 GMT S3IPPQGIB5MBFPYJKDUDLLZFCQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-pix-2024-02-26/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
Iran's uranium stock enriched to 60% shrinks but problems persist -IAEA papers sayIran's stock of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade has shrunk, bringing it below the theoretical threshold at which it could produce three atom bombs, but problems with inspectors persist, reports by the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 18:00:22 GMT JHSYNBYCGJKQ7H7MJXO27I5MQA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/irans-uranium-stock-enriched-60-shrinks-problems-persist-iaea-papers-say-2024-02-26/Francois Murphy世界中东
Exclusive: Treasury says US warning to banks slows Russia financial flowsWashington's threat to hit foreign financial institutions with sanctions has made a significant difference in financial flows between Russia and countries such as Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and Kazakhstan, said Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:34:23 GMT TW6CB3UBEBPLJJEBEFJ5CPPAOE https://www.reuters.com/world/treasury-says-us-warning-banks-slows-Russia-financial-flows-2024-02-26/Daphne Psaledakis, David Lawder, Andrea Shalal世界
US Chamber of Commerce chief visiting China this week, spokesperson saysThe chief executive of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, Suzanne Clark, is leading a delegation of former U.S. government officials to Beijing this week, the group said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 17:22:03 GMT第477章https://www.reuters.com/world/us-chamber-commerce-chief-visiting-china-this-week-spokesperson-says-2024-02-26/Reuters世界
